text: With her sixth studio album Reputation scheduled to drop on Friday 10 November, Taylor Swift has been forced to release its track list after it unexpectedly leaked online last night. Earlier this morning, the 27 - year - old posted a black and white close - up image of herself with the track list, featuring hits such'Ready For It? ','Gorgeous'and'Call It What You Want '. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below She captioned the post :'3 days until # reputation.'The singer's announcement came shortly after identical photos of the album and the backside of its cover art surfaced on the internet. From the looks of it, Reputation will be the singer's second - longest album behind her 2012 album Red with a whopping 15 tracks in total. Taylor
